page.title: 11Father by Graham Aged 8
page.content: At 8.00am my father gets up. He likes tea only for breakfast. He goes to work at 8.50am by car. He is a credit manager. He finishes work at 5.30pm. Father choose his job because the career prospects are very good. He had special training for his job which included a lot of courses. he likes meeting people and travelling. He does not like the tedious paper work that he has to do. This is his fifth job. In his leisure time he plays bridge, golf and watches soccer. He has a English car. He likes dishes with spicey sauce for dinner and sandwiches for tea. He goes to bed at 11.30pm. My Father has three people in his family and an Irish Red Setter and goldfish. His house is three years old
